poems.body:
In breath
And out breath -
A rising 
And a falling
Meet at a moment

Let one breath
Receive the next
As lovers greet
And embrace 
At their doorstep

Behold something
Like a lover
Watches the gentle face
Of sweet beloved
In her sleep

Humming space
Silence sings
Her lullaby
To her beloved
In peaceful night

Closed eyes,
The void reveals herself.
The self dissolving -
A surrender
To eternal space

In breath
And out breath -
Two lovers
Cuddling
Under the sheet

Whistling birds
Crisp dry leaves
Where do sound
Come from and go?
Silence

In breath
And out breath -
Two lovers
Hold each other
In sweet awareness

Lover and beloved
The sunshine 
And the rain
Making love
In a rainbow
